mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.train_num AS "trainNum", a.start_sta AS "startSta", a.arrival_sta AS "arrivalSta", a.arrival_date AS "arrivalDate", a.carriage_num AS "carriageNum", a.seat_num AS "seatNum", a.name AS "name", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.bingli_id_number AS "bingliIdNumber", a.province AS "province", a.lx_tel AS "lxTel", a.tel_station AS "telStation", a.ptype AS "ptype", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.resp_area AS "respArea", a.phone AS "phone", a.habitation AS "habitation", a.create_date AS "createDate"

a.id AS "id", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.train_num AS "trainNum", a.start_sta AS "startSta", a.arrival_sta AS "arrivalSta", a.arrival_date AS "arrivalDate", a.carriage_num AS "carriageNum", a.seat_num AS "seatNum", a.name AS "name", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.bingli_id_number AS "bingliIdNumber", a.province AS "province", a.lx_tel AS "lxTel", a.tel_station AS "telStation", a.ptype AS "ptype", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.resp_area AS "respArea", a.phone AS "phone", a.habitation AS "habitation", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_train( id, begin_date, train_num, start_sta, arrival_sta, arrival_date, carriage_num, seat_num, name, id_number, bingli_id_number, province, lx_tel, tel_station, ptype, of_shizhou, of_quxian, resp_area, phone, habitation, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{beginDate}, #{trainNum}, #{startSta}, #{arrivalSta}, #{arrivalDate}, #{carriageNum}, #{seatNum}, #{name}, #{idNumber}, #{bingliIdNumber}, #{province}, #{lxTel}, #{telStation}, #{ptype}, #{ofShizhou}, #{ofQuxian}, #{respArea}, #{phone}, #{habitation}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE p_train SET begin_date = #{beginDate}, train_num = #{trainNum}, start_sta = #{startSta}, arrival_sta = #{arrivalSta}, arrival_date = #{arrivalDate}, carriage_num = #{carriageNum}, seat_num = #{seatNum}, name = #{name}, id_number = #{idNumber}, bingli_id_number = #{bingliIdNumber}, province = #{province}, lx_tel = #{lxTel}, tel_station = #{telStation}, ptype = #{ptype}, of_shizhou = #{ofShizhou}, of_quxian = #{ofQuxian}, resp_area = #{respArea}, phone = #{phone}, habitation = #{habitation} WHERE id = #{id}
